trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule"></xref>.

The AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs an <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>和将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象提供给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>期间属性**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A> by setting the configuration element to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名标识时，才引发事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>通过将配置元素设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>
